com.devtence.will.dev.models.jazz

Class Author

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devtence.will.dev.models.BaseModel<Author>
      • com.devtence.will.dev.models.jazz.Author

  • public class Author
extends BaseModel<Author>
    Class that models the Author data and maps it's structure to the persistence layer, it also defines and implements the functions that can be performed with the Author.
    Since:
    2015-06-09
    Author:
    sorcerer
